title: [Large-scale] Change Management Strategy Workshop for Organizational Learning Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic concepts of organizational operations, foundational scientific problem-solving methodologies
context.additional_context: Enables role-play space configuration within classrooms, facilitating team collaboration activities using smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can analyze resistance cases arising during organizational change using at least three social constructivist techniques.
Learners can design learning dialogues to derive improvement strategies for change management scenarios through peer feedback.
Learners can present practical strategies for transforming resistance elements into organizational learning opportunities via team-based role-playing.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
